rationale: Assessed as Least Concern due to its fairly large distribution, (the basins of Rio Papaloapan and Rio Coatzalcoalcos are 37,380 and 21,120 km² respectively), and lack of any known major widespread threats.
assessor: Snoeks, J., Laleye, P. & Contreras-MacBeath, T.
evaluator: Collen, B., Darwall, W., Ram, M. & Smith, K. (SRLI Freshwater Fish Evaluation Workshop)
